title: ðŸ“¬ Mailbag: Is OBJ a Hall of Famer? Best set of brothers in the NFL + Career Advice from the Superfriends (Football 5/14)
description:
If Odell Beckham Jr. retired right now, would he even be in consideration for the Hall of Fame? That's how this mailbag starts and a sample of the questions you could have answered if you left them attached to a 5-star review on Apple Podcasts. We'll answer the no-brainers, far-fetched Qs and everything in between. Yes, we'll do some sort of Pick Six fantasy league this season. Do the Bears have depth? Which brothers would you want to start a team with right now? Will Brinson, John Breech and Ryan Wilson say some kinda nice things about the Packers before dishing out career advice as only they can.Â 
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Read the Pick Six newsletter here: https://www.cbssports.com/newsletters/picksix/
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visitÂ https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visitÂ https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

content:encoded:
If Odell Beckham Jr. retired right now, would he even be in consideration for the Hall of Fame? That's how this mailbag starts and a sample of the questions you could have answered if you left them attached to a 5-star review on Apple Podcasts. We'll answer the no-brainers, far-fetched Qs and everything in between. Yes, we'll do some sort of Pick Six fantasy league this season. Do the Bears have depth? Which brothers would you want to start a team with right now? Will Brinson, John Breech and Ryan Wilson say some kinda nice things about the Packers before dishing out career advice as only they can.Â 

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 

You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."

Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis

Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
